    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unwavering Mien](/Feats.aspx?ID=18) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 40 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your mystic control and meditations allow you to resist external influences upon your consciousness. Whenever you are affected by a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect that lasts at least 2 rounds, you can reduce the duration by 1 round.

 You still require natural sleep, but you treat your saving throws against effects that would cause you to fall asleep as one degree of success better. This protects only against [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) effects, not against other forms of falling [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38).
name: Unwavering Mien
